rgraph

Class Grid

  • java.lang.Object
    • rgraph.Grid

  • public class Grid
extends java.lang.Object
    Grid Objects are a spatial representation of the nodes in a robot.

    A grid holds a 2D array of objects, it is constructed by giving coordinates and objects in a nodes list and an edge list format.

    Since:
    2/14/2016

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Grid(java.util.List<GridObject> nodes, java.util.List<GridObject> edges, int w, int h)
      Constructs a grid from nodes, edges with a width and a height

        Parameters:
        nodes - List of grid object type nodes to insert
        edges - List of grid object type edges to insert
        w - width of grid to create
        h - height of grid to create
